com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.listener

Interface DynamicColorListener


  • public interface DynamicColorListener
    An interface to get the various color callbacks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onColorSelected(String tag, int position, int color)
      This method will be called when a color is selected.

    • Method Detail

      • onColorSelected

        void onColorSelected(String tag,
                     int position,
                     int color)
        This method will be called when a color is selected.
        Parameters:
        tag - The optional tag to differentiate between various callbacks.
        position - The selected position.
        color - The selected color.
